1.content:
Tailsana: long purple hair, emerald eyes.
Wears t-shirt with trousers that are ripped.
Two tails, 5 spikes and fox like ears. Half human
Real name: teanna





What is the setting?
1.title: Start

choices: Nova(torqoius winged hedgehog)  and Ace come
11.content:
Quiet Grassland.
The wind was blowind calmly. Scott was with Miley. His eyes were glowing white as well as Miley's. He was straing out into the distance listening to the wind blowing around him. Miley turned her head and her eyes stopped glowing and revealed blue sparkling eyes.
Miley: Scott are you almost done scanning yourself.
Scott: (eyes turn back to normal) Yes there are no parasites on me.
Miley: Okay great so you know that we have to meet Dark by the cave of wonders right.
Scott: Yes I know. Its for checkup right?
Miley: Yes.

What happens next?
11.title: Grassland

111.content:
Tailsana: hey
Scott: oh hello
Miley: who are you?
Tailsana: I'm tailsana
111.title: Tailsana appears

1111.content:
Continue
Tailsana: I am Tailsana and who are you?
Scott: My name is Scott. You shouldn't be here it can be dangerous.
Tailsana: Oh I am sorry.
Miley: Don't worry about him he is just nervous.
Tailsana: Why?
Scott: Thats is none of your buisness, but basically I have a doctor's appointment.
Miley: What he is trying to say is that he doesn't want to talk about it.
Tailsana: Oh okay then.
Scott: I am going somewhere else. (leaves)
Miley: So how are you doing?
Tailsana: I am not sure. Fine I guess and you?
Miley: I am doing well. My name is Miley. Sorry about Scott he is normally in a better mood.

What happens next?
1111.title: Continue

11113.content:
They go to a grassy place but with a much stronger wind.
Tailsana: I can't blame him.
Miley: I know
11113.title: Maisie and Tailsana go somewhere

choices: Tailsana and Miley go somewhere else
111131.content:
Continue
Tailsana: I can't blame him. Is it his first time.
Miley: No its like his third, but Scott is a little complicated.
The wind suddenly stops.
Tailsana: Whoa thats not natural.
Miley: (looks into the sky and sees a flash) Tailsana! We better move. (gets up and runs)
Tailsana: Why whats going on?(follows)
Miley:(hides in a cave) (sees the flash dissappear) That was close.
Tailsana: Who or what was that?
Miley: It was a sunshine arrow. I am a Shadow. We must be on there territory.
Tailsana: What are you talking about.
Miley: The Sunshines often mistake Shadows with Darkites. They don't like there territory being trespassed without permission.
Tailsana: But don't they know you?
Miley: Its complicated, but I normally come with Ace who is there leader. He gives me permission to come here.
Tailsana: Why did the wind stop?
Miley: The Sunshines fire there arrows so fast that it disrupts wind patterns, but we should be safe as long as we don't get too close to the border.

What happens next?
111131.title: Continue

1111311.content:
Tailsana: we are on wind territory
Miley: are we okay
Tailsana: I'm the wind princess.
Miley: oh
1111311.title: Tailsana and Miley go somewhere else

choices: fireballs come raining down from te sky
11113111.content:
Continue
Miley: Wait then how come its so bright? I thought the wind Princess' name was Sophia and lived in Icy Peak.
Tailsana: Thats my Mom she is the queen. I also have the ability to throw fireballs.
Miley: Cool, but we are not in Icy peak we are on the border of Sunshine city.
Tailsana: Yeah and that is next to Icy peak.
Miley: I thought Icy peak was next to the tundra.
Tailsana: We are in the east border not the north.
Miley: gotcha.
Scott and Dark appear
Dark: (flies in) Okay Scott you passed.
Scott: So I am still cured.
Dark: Yes.

What happens next?
11113111.title: Continue

111131111.content:
Tailsana: I'm not even gonna ask, it ain't any of my business.
Scott: ok....
Miley: tailsana's the wind princess.
111131111.title: Continue

1111311111.content:
Continue
Scott: I know I can also read minds. Also I don't like her.
Miley: Wait why what did she do to you?
Scott: She disturbed my peace. You know how I feel about my peace.
Tailsana: Sorry I didn't know.
Scott: Well I will give you a second chance. Since you don't know me.
Tailsana: What is that supposed to mean.
Scott: (Disappears)
Tailsana: What is his problem? All I said was hi and he already doesn't like me.
Miley: I don't even understand, but Scott will be Scott.
Tailsana: How did he disappear?
Miley: Its a teleporter that he got from Dark.
Dark: Who are you?
Tailsana: I am Tailsana the wind princess and you are?
Dark: Dark the Shadow. I am a commander.

what happens next?
1111311111.title: Continue

11113111112.content:
Sammy: hello dark.
Tailsana: uh....
Sammy: who are you?
Tailsana: tailsana the wind princess.
Sammy: sammatha the fox, a shadow person
11113111112.title: Another fox appears

111131111121.content:
Continue
Dark: She is one of the healers. They are rare, but useful.
Tailsana: You have the ability to heal people.
Samantha: Yes but I am new at it. I can only heal small wounds. Dark assigned Michelle to help me.
Miley: She isn't an official Shadow, but she is on her way.
Tailsana: Who is Michelle?
Miley: Another healer. She is also a boxer.
Tailsana: Wow I can't believe I never heard about the Shadows.
Dark: We keep our group secret. (flies away) Later.
Tailsana: Where is he going?
Sammy: Who knows he does that alot.

What happens next?
111131111121.title: Continue

1111311111211.content:
Scott: hello again.
Miley: hey Scott
Tailsana: hi
1111311111211.title: Scott returns

11113111112111.content:
Continue
Scott: So you are still here.
Tailsana: Yes I am.
Scott: (his eyes start glowing)
Miley: Scott calm down she doesn't want any trouble.
Scott: (goes back to normal)
Tailsana: Whoa what up with the eyes?
Miley: Its his powers. They do that when he gets irritated.
Tailsana: Oh I'm sorry.
Scott: (says nothing)
Tailsana: Um is something wrong?
Scott: (says nothing, but stares)
Miley: (her eyes start glowing)
Scott: (Looks at Miley) I am going to see Lucy. (leaves)
Miley: (turns back to normal) That was close.
Tailsana: What was?
Miley: you don't want to know.

What happens next?
11113111112111.title: Continue

111131111121111.content:
Tailsana: ok........
Miley: you really don't want to know
111131111121111.title: Continue

1111311111211111.content:
Continue.
Tailsana: Ok what is so bad about what he was going to do?
Miley: Its the side of his powers that noone wants to mess with. Lets just say that.
Tailsana: Okay I guess I don't want to know.
Miley: Okay so do you want to do something?
Tailsana: Sure what do you have in mind.
Sammy: Let's meet up with Michelle.

What happens next?
1111311111211111.title: Continue

choices: Miley, Michelle, and Tailsana practice their powers
11113111112111111.content:
They meet up with Michelle the hedgehog at a beach
Sammy: (sees Michelle) Hello.
Michelle: Hi Sammy didn't expect you so soon.
Sammy: I was just in the meighborhood.
Michelle: So who are your friends?
Sammy: Well you Miley.
Miley: Hi
Sammy: The fox is Tailsana.
Tailsana: Hi how are you?
Michelle: I am doing well thanks for asking. and you?
Tailsana: fine.

What happens next?

111131111121111112.content:
Tailsana has fire and wind power. They also practice weapons as well
Miley: cool powers
Tailsana: thanks
111131111121111112.title: Miley, Michelle, and Tailsana practice their po...

choices: Michelle asks Tailsana about her powers
1111311111211111121.content:
Continue
Michelle: Thanks. I really don't have powers. (she knows how to box, but doesn't have super powers. Her ablilities are speed and agility. She uses her abilities to make up for her powers)
Tailsana: Then how were you able to block fire.
Michelle: It's my gloves. They are fire proof. I am also a boxer so I know how to use my abilities.
Taisana: Cool.
Miley: I can teleport and I also have force powers. That's why you got confused a couple of times.
Michelle: I knew that.
Miley: I was talkong to Tailsana she doesn't know me that well.
Tailsana: True. You seem a little mysterious.
Miley: Yeah I get that alot.

What happens next?
1111311111211111121.title: continue

choices: he declines (don't worry,he will join later.....i hope.)
111131111121112.content:
mephiles:well,well,well,if it isn't some insects i can crush!
Scott:who are you?
mephiles:i am mephiles the dark!
something sparkles in mephileses hand
miley:thats a chaos emerald!
mephiles:indeed,for years i was trying to awaken the soul within the negative energy of the chaos emerald.
but i heard it needs alot of bad things to happen on the planet.
it happened once and thats all it was supposed to happen,but now,i will release it once more!
emerald turns black
Scott:whah?
mephiles:yes,YES!finally, after so long the soul is going to be released!RISE NAZO!
nazo comes out of the emerald
nazo:where am i?
mephiles:your out of the emerald.
Nazo:whats an emerald?
Scott:apparently, he forgot his memory.
nazo:huh,its darkness.time to destroy it!
mephiles:oh...this is bad.
nazo beats the lovin crap out of him
nazo:all i remember are my name,that negative energy and i are connected somehow,and the name.....shadic.
Scott:do you remember anything after that?
nazo:i remember waking up on the beach and i saw a green hedgehog,and after that i was sealed in the chaos emerald.
Scott:well,maybe you can join us on our adventure.
so,what happens next?
111131111121112.title: Mephiles comes

1111311111211121.content:
Continue
Scott: Maybe you can join our adventure.
Nazo: Adventure?
Scott: You're emerald. It has a different energy than a power crystal.
Mephiles: (gets up) Power crystal? What! I thought there were only seven chaos emeralds.
Miley: You obviously don't know where you are do you guys?
Nazo: (looks around) This planet...
Scott: Welcome to the world of Metropolis. (eyes starts glowing)
Miley: Oh we need to go! Like now!
Nazo: Why? What's going on here?
Scott: (turns and attacks Nazo)
Nazo: What the! (dodges a light beam) You fool! (Shoots a energy beam)
Scott: (absorbs the energy)
Miley: That was a terrible idea. Let me handle this.
Memphiles: Why is this happening? That weakling wasn't like this before.
Miley: (tackles Scott) (her eyes start glowing) No time to talk. (she stares into Scott's eyes)
Scott: (has a hypnotized look on his face and his eyes stop glowing) What happened?
Nazo: What? That power ...I don't understand.
Miley: That was close. We need to get him to Dark
Mephiles: Who are you? What is going on with him and who is Dark?
Miley: We have a lot of explaining to do.
Tailsana: Why am I still here? (leaves)
Miley: No wait! We need you.
Samantha: I am staying. I need to talk to Dark and I need to see Michelle.
Scott: Michelle...
Miley: We need your help.
Nazo: Hmm...I don't quite understand this world but I will join you in your adventure.
Mephiles: Hmm...I will as well. (thinking) "As soon as I get the power crystals...ultimate power will be mine!"
What happens next?
1111311111211121.title: nazo joins them

choices: As they were walking they find a power crystal
11113111112111211.content:
Continue
Nazo joins the adventure.
In the previous chapters we find out that Tailsana is a wind princess. We also discover that in the world of Metropolis there are these crystals called power crystals. Power crystals are not like chaos emeralds because they have a different energy as you will discover in the later chapters.

However we also discover that Samantha is on a quest to becaome a Shadow. Shadows are a people group that fight against the Darkites which are brutal invaders that try to take over the planet. Samantha was assigned by Dark, who is a Shadow leader, to get training from Michelle. Michelle is a boxer and a healer which is a rare type of creature found on te planet. Samantha discovered that she was a healer and wanted to become a Shadow to fight against the Darkites. How did all of this happen? Well this will be explained in later chapters.

Tailsana is a wind princess and a Sunshine. Sunshines are a people group that live next to the Shadows. Shadows look like Darkites because both people groups have black fur. The difference between them is that the Darkites act more like parasites. (kind of like zombies except they are not contagious and they are not slow and ugly.) Tailsana got involved with Scott and Miley when she decided to cross the Sunshine border to meet with her friend Astrid. Why she did will be explained later.

Scot is a black furred fox that has force powers. Miley is his teacher and he is her apprentice. Scott is very powerful but he often has trouble controling his power. Miley has more experience than him and understands how to use force powers. However Scott had gotten "sick" and his powers are raging about like crazy. (they are activated by other types of energy but his illness is that his powers are over reacting with his emotions, which isn't normal) Miley is taking hi to Dark because he knows how to cure this disorder. So without further ado let's continue.

Miley: Okay we first need to get to the Cave of Wonders.
Tailsana: That's on the way to Astrid's house.
Samantha: I haven't seem Michelle all day.
Scott: Hmmm...
Tailsana: What are you thinking...Scott?
Scott: (stares) Chaos emeralds?
Nazo: Chaos emeralds? Power crystals? Ultimate power.
Mephiles: Yes ultimate power...So who are you hedgehog girl.
Miley: I am Miley and you are.
Mephiles:Mephiles. Hmph you sound like a intelligent girl. So tell me about this world.
Miley: Metropolis? Hmm, where do I start?
Scott:(to Nazo) So your name is Shadic.
Nazo: Actually call me Nazo...Shadic?
Samantha: Scott where is Michelle?
Scott: I don't know.

What happens next?
11113111112111211.title: Continue

1111312.content: Then a Black Hedgewolf walks out of the forrest followed by Ace. Ace: Prince Hypon, I must intervene, but dont see who it is. Hypon: Ace, Mum might of made you leader but I'm still Prince and I must protect the Clan, and I'm going to see who you tried to kill. Hypon's mum was killed by a Darkite. Hypon was adopted by the sunshines for the king wanted a son and one of the daugthers found him with a armbrace and the gem of time (long story)
1111312.title: A sunshine appears

11113121.content:
Continue
Hypon and Ace
Ace: I didn't try to kill anyone. It wasn't me. Also you Mom didn't make me leader. Knoxis made me his apprentice. You were always a prince.
Hypon: Come on let's see who is out there.
Ace: Fine.

What happens next?
11113121.title: Continue

111131211.content: Hypon spots Miley but he couldnt really tell you was with her. Hypon: Miley, is that You? Miley: Yes. Ace: Prove it! Hypon: Ace, You and I know what she looks like, why do you think all shadows look like darkites? I look like a shadow cause I'm a wolf, are you going to mistake me as a darkite too?
111131211.title: Continue

1111312111.content:
Continue
Ace and Hypon
Ace: I shouldn't be so cautious. I was appointed to protect the city. If I go easy on anyone then we might as well not exist. I am only being fair.
Miley: Hmm, something is different about you, Ace. You're normally not this cautious.
Hypon: He isn't? I mean you shouldn't be so cautious all of the time.
Ace: You don't understand. Recently a Shadow imposter had entered our gates. He was obviously a Darkite but he almost killed you're mother, Tahairah.
Hypon: Oh, I am sorry, I didn't know but now I understand.
Miley: Well you can trust me. If I was a Darkite or metaphorically, you found out that I was one, then you can take me to the dungeon.
Ace: (smiles) Only a real Shadow would say that.
Hypon: So what's the status on the city?
Ace: Neutral, the Darkite was named Morpheus, but there was only one reported in the city. Whoever enters must go through scanning and stuff until we can conclude that the city is safe. Right now security is pretty tight.

What happens next?
1111312111.title: Continue

1111312112.content:
Continue
Miley and Hypon.
Miley: Shh, you two really need to learn how to get along.
Hypon: Yeah you're right but why do you look like a Darkite?
Miley: Because Darkites were once Shadows before the parasite invasion.
Hypon: Oh now I remember.
Ace: I am going back to Sunshine village. (leaves)
Hypon: Yeah just go home.
Tailsana: Hypon? I have not seen you in awhile.

What happens next?
1111312112.title: Miley breaks up the arugement

11113121121.content: Hypon: I know Tailsana. I've been so busy, trying to make peace with other clan, and so far I only got Kura's and Silfer's Clan. But the next clan is the Ice Wolfs and they hate me.

Hypon and friends

Kura: That works.

Hypon: It say that they disbanded for protection from the Darkites. They knew their potential and how to fight well but they knew that the Darkites would corrupt them.

Tailsana and Ace.

Tailsana: Well my heritage comes from Poseidon my father and my genes come from Rena my mother. My father passed long ago. My mother is a rebel. So technically yes.
Ace: That's unusual, say you are drooling a little.
Tailsana: Oh sorry. (slurps it up)
Miley: Um, so what were you and Hypon talking about?
Ace: Basically how Hypon became a prince of the Sunshines. Knoxis (colorful winged hedgehog) is the king it's really complicated.

115.content: Far away from Scott, a few dark clouds appeared. (Miley) I Know who that is Scott. (Scott) Ah Hypon is coming to check on me again. What happens next?
1151.title: Continue

11512.content: (Miley) Why dont you come in before you have to leave quickly again. (Hypon) Sure, I have about 3 weeks til next mission. (Miley) (cheers) well ur welcome to stay at our place. (At the cave)
11512.title: Miley takes Hypon to their house. (cave)

115121.content:
Continue
Hypon and Miley.
Hypon: So why do you live in a cave.
Miley: It's the safest place for me to stay. Metropolis is going to be invaded soon.
Hypon: I understand. Your powers are valuable.
Miley: Well Scott keeps me company.

What happens next?
115121.title: Continue

1151211.content: Hypon: Well, I could help you guys out. Remember my mum leads the Sunshines and I'm lead a part of Shadows.
1151211.title: Continue

11512111.content:
Continue
Hypon and Miley
Miley: Yes I know. We need a plan and a back up.
Scott: Wait let's call a emergency meeting. It will be between the Shadow and Sunshine tribe.

What happens next?
11512111.title: Continue

12.content:
The forest setting.
Characters found in the forest.
Flash: lemur with black fur that has orange tiger markings. He has a laser, but doesn't use it often.
Fluffy: Flash's pet. looks like pikachu from pokeman excet with a fluffy mohawk. Same fur scheme as pikachu except black and orange. Has fire powers.
Bullseye: purple hedgehog which has a target on his chest and a red crystal on his forehead. Shoots arrows and can teleport. (brutal hunter)

So let's get started. Tailsana decided to take a walk in the forest. Scott and Miley decided to come over to Flash's house.
Scott: So you really think we can find a power crystal today.
Miley: I hope so. Flash and Fluffy are experts on this stuff.
Maeanwhile.
Tailsana:(thinking to herself) Whoa! I have not been here before.
Bullseye: (hiding behind a tree)

What happens next?
12.title: Forest

15.content:
To keep this from going on several chapters I will start the story.
Tailsana the fox returns home from her visit to Mobius. She brings her friends and Sonic and his. They first meet Scott who is a mysterious fox and Miley who is a friendly hedgehog. Also Scott's friend. Scott and Miley show them Sonic and his friends around Metropolis.
(Fastforward) They all get settled and meet Silfer(fire fox), Kierra(purple wolf), Twilight(blue wolf. also nicknamed Frost), and Joshua (Red fox. very busy). Scott and silfer go on a mission.

What happens next
15.title: More choices

154.content:
Tailsana and sonic and his friends are relaxing by the falls.
Amy: this place is beautiful
Cream: it's so nice.
Tailsana: I have a brother who lives near here.
Sonic: what's his name?
Tailsana: dash.
154.title: Falls

choices: A horse comes from the bushes
1541.content:
Continue
Tailsana: Dash
Suddenly they hear a rustle in the bushes.
Cream: What is that?
Sonic: Probably just the wind.
Amy: (hears some footsteps) No not wind. (stands up)
Sonic: Hmm
Tailsana: I feel like something has been watching us.

What happens next?
1541.title: Continue

15411.content:
Tailsana: I'll go and check it out.
Sonic: I'll come with you.
15411.title: Continue

154111.content:
Continue
They walk over to the bush
Tailsana: I wonder what is behind that bush.
Sonic: Who knows.
Tailsana: Only one way to find out. (looks behind the bush)
A clawed rabbit jumps out
Tailsana: Whoa! It's a rabbit bear thing.
Sonic: No it looks more like Morpheus.
Rabbit: Aw man how do you do that?
Sonic: It's your eyes and a rabbit doesn't have long sharp claws.
Morpheus: Some do.
Tailsana: Why were you spying on us.
Morpheus: I wasn't. I was hiding from Dark.

What happens next?
154111.title: Continue

1541111.content:
Tailsana: why?
Morpheus: long story....
1541111.title: Continue

15411111.content:
Continue
Morpheus: It's a long story but basically it was Gricer's fault.
Tailsana: I am surprised that you still work for him.
Morpheus: He created me and I like the lab.
Scott comes
Scott: Morpheus? Is that you?
Morpheus: Scott? I haven't seen you since Darkness the dragon pushed you off of the cliff.
Scott: That was alot to say. So what have you been up to lately.
Morpheus: Nothing much just dealing with Gricer.
Scott: Isn't he a Darkite?
Morpheus: Yeah but he converted into a Shadow.
Tailsana: We got to move I think I sense someone coming.

What happens next?
15411111.title: continue

info.brief_description: Metropolis is a planet like earth, but has "Sonic inspired" animals and few humans
info.description:
These are some starter characters. You may use them, but they may not have any relationship with any other characters that you made up. The only exceptions are if they are approved by me or they meet your character in the story. Also if you are going to add another character please describe them first.
Basic rules.
1.) No swearing or sex of any kind
2.) No death (violence is acceptable)
3.) please be descriptive.
4.) Have fun.

Okay great now the character

Dark: Black-furred winged hedgehog
Ace: White albino hedgehog (Dark's friend)
Scott: Black-furred fox (Dark's rival, but secret friend)
Miley: Black-furred female hedgehog (Scott's best friend)

The setting can be a forest, grassland, city, dessert, or whatever you like.
